meanings.definition: A large, modern cinema complex with multiple screens.
meanings.sent1: We went to the megaplexes to watch the latest blockbuster movie.
meanings.sent2: The megaplexes in the city always have the newest releases.
meanings.sent3: I tried to count all the screens in the megaplexes, but lost track after ten!
meanings.sent4: The megaplexes stood tall like giants in the entertainment industry.
meanings.sent5: The bright lights of the megaplexes beckoned moviegoers from afar.

meanings.definition: A group of interconnected buildings or structures.
meanings.sent1: The industrial park was a megaplexes of warehouses and factories.
meanings.sent2: The megaplexes of office buildings formed a bustling business district.
meanings.sent3: The megaplexes of trees in the forest seemed to whisper secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was a megaplexes of towering skyscrapers reaching for the sky.
meanings.sent5: The ancient ruins revealed a megaplexes of interconnected chambers and passageways.
